author: Johnny Lieu
title: Blogger learns that it's never OK to talk down pizza
text:
Here's a life tip: Never, ever talk ill of pizza.
While there recently have been arguments over what exactly should go on pizza , there will be hell to pay for those who try to get people to stop eating it.
SEE ALSO: Iceland's president said he would ban pineapple on pizza if he could
As a Nigerian fitness website called Naija Gym Blog found out over Twitter, when it received the wrath of the internet when tried to badmouth pizza.
According to its tweet, eating two slices is the equivalent of swallowing three spoons of warm oil, although really it sounds like a highly torturous method of eating the best part of pizza (the grease).
Two slices of pizza are the equivalent to swallowing 3 spoons of warm oil. Do you feel like eating pizza now? pic.twitter.com/MXBl9lFIYv
‚Äî Naija Gym Blog (@naijagym) February 16, 2017
TBH, that stock photo of a pizza looks pretty good. And soon enough, hundreds of people responded to the tweet to agree. Yes, we will eat the pizza.
I don't think this is quite going the way @naijagym intended pic.twitter.com/3aIAAxAlet

‚Äî christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) February 19, 2017
Najia Gym Blog posted a poll to sort it out once and for all, and was shown the answer. LOVE FOR PIZZA POLLüòÉ:
Two slices of pizza are the equivalent to swallowing 3 spoons of warm oil. Do you feel like eating pizza now?
Pls RT
‚Äî Naija Gym Blog (@naijagym) February 20, 2017
At the time of writing, the poll's result was 90 per cent yes, 10 per cent no, based on more than 12,000 votes.
See? Pizza is love. Pizza is life.
